text: Coimbatore District Textile Workers Union, a trade union in the textile industry in Coimbatore District, Tamil Nadu, India. CDTWU is affiliated to the Hind Mazdoor Sabha. The general secretary of CDTWU is A. Subramaniam and the president is Rajamani (state secretary of HMS). Category:Hind Mazdoor Sabha- affiliated unions Category:Textile and clothing trade unions Category:Economy of Coimbatore Category:Textile industry in Tamil Nadu
title: Coimbatore District Textile Workers Union
